inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Bethesda category I, II, III, or IV by fine needle aspiration or needle biopsy.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 1 cm or smaller than 1 cm length

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: no lymph node or distant metastasis

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: thyroid cancer does not have extrathyroidal extension

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: who agrees to the consent form

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: can be routinely followed up according to the study schedule

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Bethesda category V or VI by fine needle aspiration or needle biopsy.

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with lymph node and adrenal gland involvement, which may make it difficult to completely ablate the cancer using RF. Additionally, the patient's history of XRT and RAI ablation may also impact eligibility.
